title: Trusts and Trustees; Accounts
context: CHAPTER 554 TRUSTS AND TRUSTEES; ACCOUNTS Section 554-1 Vesting title to trust estates 554-2 Nomination by beneficiaries; appointment of trustees 554-3 Trust estates, leases, investments, etc. 554-4 Annual account; trustees to file 554-5 Repealed 554-6 Investments 554-7 Assignee for creditors, instructions, and approval of accounts 554-8 Charitable trusts; expenses 554-9 Charitable trusts; leases 554-10 Charitable trusts; administration Note Uniform prudent management of institutional funds act, see chapter 517E.
